snippet: The soldiers apparently suffocated during an exercise meant to prepare them for being taken prisoner by the enemy, a military spokesman said Wednesday.
abstract: Two South Korean soldiers die, apparently by suffocation, during an exercise meant to prepare them for capture by the enemy at base in Jeungpyeong.
lead_paragraph: The soldiers apparently suffocated during an exercise meant to prepare them for being taken prisoner by the enemy, a military spokesman said Wednesday.

headline.main: 2 South Korean Soldiers Die in Anti-Captivity Training
headline.print_headline: South Korea: Soldiers Die in Exercise
